tool.name: Generate muon structures (pm-muairss)
tool.command: pip show pymuon-suite || ( git clone https://github.com/muon-spectroscopy-computational-project/pymuon-suite /tmp/pymuon-suite && pip install /tmp/pymuon-suite && rm -rf /tmp/pymuon-suite) && ln -s $structure input.cell && ln -s $params params.yaml && #if str($iscastep.iscastep_sel)=="yes": ln -s $castep_param castep.param && #end if pm-muairss -t w input.cell params.yaml && out_folder="`python ${__tool_directory__}/get_out_folder.py`" && #if str($iscastep.iscastep_sel)=="yes": zip -r out_zip1.zip \$out_folder params.yaml input.cell castep.param && #else if str($iscastep.iscastep_sel)=="no": zip -r out_zip1.zip \$out_folder params.yaml input.cell && #end if ln -s out_zip1.zip out_zip.zip && find \$out_folder > tree.txt
tool.help:
usage: pm-muairss [-h] [-t {r,w}] structures parameter_file
Given an input structure, generates a set of structures with a muon added in a random location.
